title: Bug 6191  Should be able to select contents of string
description: In a previous version of Eclipse, and in VAJ, and in VAME, I could double-click  inside a Java string and select the whole string. This is handy for replacing  the text in the string. For example, if you have a string "This is a pretty long string and it is incorrect" then you could double-click in between the first " and the T or after the last t and before the end " and the whole string would be selected. Currently, double-click only selects between brackets. It should select  between "s as well. Try it in VAJ or VAME to see what I mean.
